content.question: The purpose of the Truman Doctrine of 1947 was to

choices.label: decrease the risk of nuclear war by placing atomic weaponry under the control of the United Nations
prevent communism from spreading further through military aggression
retake Eastern Europe from the Soviet Union
prevent the spread of independence movements in European colonies in Asia and Africa
create an atmosphere of trust in which negotiation with the Soviet Union would have the best chance for success

content.answer: prevent communism from spreading further through military aggression
